channel.title: chicken on What Da Hex!
channel.description: Recent content in chicken on What Da Hex!

item.description: Day 1: Breakfast: Omelette of 3 egg whites and one whole egg. Mix in veggies like spinach, capsicum, onions, coriander, green chillis. Some salt and pepper for taste. Wash it down with a teaspoon of apple cider vinegar in half a glass of water. Lunch: Rice cooked (150 gms) with 1 cup of daal (lentils) and sauteed broccoli. A lot of water during the day.
